## B)
```{r}
q <- 1 / 10 #Pas dans énoncé
u <- 0.91 #Énoncé
Theta <- ceiling(log( 1 - u) / log(1 - q)) #discret

# vérification
1 - (1 - q)^Theta

V <- c(0.76, 0.83) #Énoncé
W <-  sapply(1:2, function(i) - 1 / Theta * log(1 - V[i]))

alpha <- 0.8
U <- sapply(1:2, function(i) (1 - alpha) / (exp(W[i] - alpha)))
```

## C)
```{r}
qexp(U[1], 1 / 10); qlnorm(U[2], 2, 0.9)
```
